summary: Allows you to cook Charred Skeever Meat from Skeever Tail + Salt Pile and Charred Skeever Hide from a Skeever Tail.
descriptionHtml:
I was inspired to make this by Fs97's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49007]mod[/url] when it dawned on me that I could just make recipes myself in the CK pretty easily.

Charred skeever hide is pretty hard to find but there are skeever everywhere and skeever tails as well, you just can't do anything with them. Still yet, charred skeever hide remains a core ingredient to several recipes.

So for a little added immersion, now you can make charred skeever hide yourself with a skeever tail [s]and some salt[/s]. It'll show up under MISC rather than FOOD since charred skeever hide doesn't count as a food.

[color=green]UPDATE![/color] I realized there's also Charred Skeever Meat which isn't cookable either so now as of 1.1 charred skeever meat will be skeever tail + salt pile and charred skeever hide will be just a skeever tail. Since one's a food item and one isn't this makes the most sense. Also, seeing skeevers on cooking spits just charring where the giants cook them (whose bodies contain charred skeever hide) I think it's probably pretty realistic that it would be the case.

[b]Changelog[/b]
1.1 - Charred skeever meat added as skeever tail + salt pile. Charred skeever hide now just skeever tail.
1.0 - Initial release. Charred skeever hide is skeever tail + salt pile
author: XunAmarox
